events.name: Decarbonisation of transportation sector
events.wd_description: The decarbonisation of the transportation sector is expected to rely on electric vehicles (EV), mainly equipped with Lithium Ion Batteries (LIB).
events.description: The decarbonisation of the transportation sector is expected to rely on electric vehicles (EV), mainly equipped with Lithium Ion Batteries (LIB).

events.name: Development of parametric model
events.wd_description: A parametric model was developed to quantify the flows in the graphite value chain and its use in electric vehicles between 2020 and 2050 in several scenarios.
events.description: A parametric model was developed to quantify the flows in the graphite value chain and its use in electric vehicles between 2020 and 2050 in several scenarios.

events.name: Analysis of paragraphs
events.wd_description: The provided paragraphs describe the expected decarbonisation of the transportation sector and the development of a parametric model.
